title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 145.1 - Purpose and general description
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 145.1 - Purpose and general description

State Regulations
(a) This Part implements Section
314
(3)
and Section
316
of the

Executive Law. Section
314
(3)
of the Executive Law requires the
director to provide for an administrative hearing in the event that a business
enterprise is denied certification as a minority or women-owned business
enterprise and in cases where the director intends to revoke the certification
of a minority or women-owned business enterprise or in cases concerning
contractor/agency complaints. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
145.1

Amended, New

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 22, effective
6/4/2014

Amended

New

York State Register December 2, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 48, eff. 12/2/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
